633910.name: Zombie Panic! Source Official Soundtrack
633910.description:
Zombie Panic! Source Official Soundtrack by KillahMo and KaempeLaeske introduces you 27 different tracks from the memorable standalone modification Zombie Panic! Source.

The original soundtrack was composed solely by Erik Grant (AKA KillahMo) from the former ZPS dev team and released on Dec 28, 2007. Then the latest sound designer, KaempeLaeske, created three new musics (Frozenheart, Work Hazard, and Zomboeing) to our newest maps shipped on ZPS v3.0 update which was released on Dec 8, 2017.
633910.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
